channel.title: Music – PERRY COMO
channel.description: Recent content in PERRY COMO on Music

item.title: PERRY COMO - And I Love You So
item.description:
작곡: Sung by / 작사: Don McLean
KY: 2018 / KY: 7212

And I love you so
The people ask me how
How I’ve lived till now
I tell them
I don’t know
I guess they understand
How lonely
life has been
But life began again
The day
you took my hand
And yes I- know
now lonely life can be
The shadow follow me
The night
won’t see me free
But I don’t- let
evening get me down
Now that you’re
around me
And you love me so
Your thoughts
are just for how
You set my spirit free
I’m happy that you do
The book of life
is brief and once
a page is read
All but life is dead
That is my belief
And yes I- know
now lonely life can be
The shadow follow me
The night
won’t see me free
But I don’t- let
evening
get me down
Now that you’re
around too- -.
